snippet: President Obama is vowing to fight Islamic State after the militant group beheaded American journalist, James Foley. At a news conference, the president said "When people harm Americans anywhere, we do what's necessary to see that justice is done....

headline.sub: U.S. will be relentless against Islamic State after beheading: Obama
headline.main: U.S. will be relentless against Islamic State after beheading: Obama

lead_paragraph: President Obama is vowing to fight Islamic State after the militant group beheaded American journalist, James Foley. At a news conference, the president said "When people harm Americans anywhere, we do what's necessary to see that justice is done." Jillian Kitchener reports.
